meta.title: Live Tennis API - Tennis Tours Listing
meta.description: Lists tours available for query on other API endpoints

fields.tour_code: String - used to query tournaments endpoint in conjunction with tour_season_id
fields.tour_season_id: Integer - used to query tournaments endpoint in conjunction with tour_code
